column1: #Text=The glass ceiling for women has been shattered around the world long time ago with Thatcher, Merkel and many many others.
#Text=The fact that the right female candidate has not come along in the US, has nothing to do with 'glass ceiling'.
#Text=Did the writer cry out about glass ceiling when Sarah Palin was not supported?
#Text=Palin was not supported for the same reason Clinton was not supported - voters did not find either of them suitable for the job.
#Text=Accept the result of the election and move on.
